meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels clearly read 2271.1. The red needle is precisely halfway between the 0.04 and 0.05 marks on the dial (representing 0.045 m³). Following standard rounding convention (round half up) to the specified 0.01 resolution, the dial value is taken as 0.05. The needle angle is calculated based on 0.045/0.10 * 360 degrees.
